title: RP cards and riot's support systeme
body:
so i bought 3  20 euros RP card ..and when  i tried to redeem it ..it gave me the 
we apologie , but our store was unable to process your payment at this time. please wait a few minutes and try again. if you've received this message multiple times, please contact us at http://support.leagueooflegends.com/
 i contacted the supp...at first the replays were fast and helpfull but i didnt get a replay since 2 days now and its  getting frustrating ...does anyone knows what i should do?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Support is currently backlogged and requests may take longer than usual (48 hours+), rest assured however that you will receive a response.

Please refrain from adding additional info to and/or "bumping" your ticket as this will actually push you to the back of the ticket queue, only reply when needed :)
